banner.title: Our sectors
banner.subtitle: Smart Building, the intelligent building offering more efficient usage and energy consumption.
banner.description: Intelligent buildings consist of spaces designed around common objectives such as environmental protection, energy efficiency, security, or simply functional purposes like communication or management of leisure areas. Smart building technology is a real help for business management: it allows them to reach their full potential while optimizing costs.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Smart Building: IoT at the service of connected buildings and their energy expenditures
about.description1: By 2029, the Smart Building market is expected to reach 80 billion euros. This trend is exploding as cities transform and so do our structures: they are becoming connected. But what exactly are we talking about? The smart building aims to reduce expenses, offer better occupancy conditions, and preserve our planet. It provides a solution to a major concern of our century: the preservation of energy resources.
about.description2: Are you looking for a strategic and technological partner to support you in transforming your buildings?

solutions_section.title: We offer agnostic, open and interoperable IoT solutions
solutions_section.description_1: Our platforms natively integrate multi-connectivity and multi-sensors to facilitate the implementation, deployment and industrialization of any IoT project, end-to-end. Stay focused on exploiting your data and managing your activity thanks to our easy-to-use solutions.
solutions_section.description_2: Your uses evolve, the type of equipment, network connectivity or the volume of your object fleet? No problem, our platforms have been developed with this objective, to support you in the evolution of your needs and expectations, easily and quickly.
solutions_section.description_3: Keep control of your project deployment, and benefit from an interoperable, secure and ready-to-use solution that ensures the scalability of your project, while controlling your R.O.I.
solutions_section.subtitle: Our Solutions!

sirgps.title: SirGPS
sirgps.description: The SirGPS web and mobile application is the GPS fleet management tool, to promote cost reduction.

support_section.title: We support you throughout your project
support_section.description_1: As a publisher, connectivity is at the heart of our business, in our offers as well as in the platforms we design. In order to provide a solution and service that is both global and unique, we integrate into our tools the objects designed by our manufacturing partners, directly on our intelligent platforms.
support_section.mission_description: Support you across the entire IoT value chain to guarantee the success of your project.
support_section.concrete_description_1: Tell us about your project and we will identify together a use case, from which the solution made for you will emerge.
support_section.concrete_description_2: From choosing objects to exploiting your data, including choosing connectivity, our role is to build with you a project that resembles you. Our experts have written, just for you, a connectivity guide to support you during step 2: connect your objects!
